alert.note: Alert for Muhlenberg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 12:49PM EST until February 08 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise affecting Muhlenberg County. .Recent rainfall has caused rises on the Green River, which will cause the level at Paradise to rise above flood stage tonight. For the Green River...including Paradise, Calhoun...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Paradise. * WHEN...From this evening to Tuesday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM CST Friday the stage was 377.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 382.9 feet early Sunday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 380.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
